content: Excluding the effect on the income attributable to common shareholders for the quarter of the change in fair value of derivatives and gain on sale of a vessel, the adjusted earnings attributable to common shareholders for the fourth quarter of this year would have been $1.18 per share basic and per share diluted compared to adjusted earnings of $4.34 per share basic and 24 and $4.89 per share diluted for the same period of last year.
